company.title: Our Story
company.description:
AdroitGrow Private Limited is a progressive Architectural and Engineering firm specializing in Industrial design, Project Management, and Corporate Interiors. Established in 2019, we provide high-quality services for both industrial and commercial sectors, offering single-window, one-stop solutions with emphasis on cost control and value additions using current technologies.

Our comprehensive approach covers everything from initial concept development to final project handover, ensuring seamless execution and superior quality at every stage.
highlights: Founded in 2019 with 20+ years of leadership experience
Specialized in Industrial, Commercial, and Corporate projects
Single-window solution provider for end-to-end project delivery
Emphasis on cost optimization and value engineering
Pan-India presence with projects across 10+ states

members.name: Manish Bhatnagar
members.bio: A Civil Engineer with over two decades of experience in executing Industrial, Commercial, and Corporate Interior projects. Mr. Bhatnagar leads and coordinates multidisciplinary projects including civil, HVAC, plumbing, solar, electrical, and PEB structural design. His expertise spans across project conceptualization, detailed engineering, procurement, and successful execution of turnkey projects.
